Title: The Rescue (2)
Plot:
Kris is a girl with a troubled past who gets a second chance when she goes to work at a horse farm. But being an outsider in a high-stakes world isn't easy.
Her only friend is a horse named Wildfire. But when he's threatened she makes a decision that will affect both their lives forever.
Writer: Christopher Teague, Michael Piller, Shawn Piller
